title: New Client takes forever to login
body:
Hi, I was just wondering if anybody is experiencing the same issue. The new client takes a very long time to authenticate (sometimes up to 5 minutes) and load but when I switch to the legacy client it doesn't take much time at all. So I thought maybe its not a problem with my internet and maybe the server or the client itself?  This has been happening since the latest patch. If anyone could give me any information on how to resolve this issue it would be much appreciated!

GLHF :)

replies.body: seriously it's still happening it's still annoying
mine has been logging in for the past hour
yes it takes about a minute once ive typed my username in compared to like 5 seconds in the old legacy client it is a massive drawback
Same problem here. It can take several minutes to finally get into the game after typing in my password.

If you're still having issues with the new client, I strongly urge you to create a new post with as much information as you can provide. Hopefully, we'll be able to work with you to resolve any issues that you're having!
